issue.title: [CF 973] Error on Export->To String
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Type /tmw options. Go to Import/Export/Restore -> Export To string and the error pops

``` Message: ...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3117: attempt to call global 'FindGroupFromInfo' (a nil value) Time: 07/22/14 16:54:39 Count: 1 Stack: ...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3117: in function <...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3113> (tail call): ? [C]: ? [string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[4]"]:5> (tail call): ? Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1574: in function `Fire' [string "*:OnLoad"]:28: in function `GetAvailableImportExportTypes' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\ImportExport.lua:1054: in function `HandleTopLevelMenu' Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\ImportExport.lua:1220: in function `initFunction' ...face\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\TMWUIDropDownMenu.lua:128: in function `Initialize' ...face\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\TMWUIDropDownMenu.lua:825: in function `Toggle' [string "*:OnEnter"]:6: in function <[string "*:OnEnter"]:1> Locals: <none> ```

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
TMW 7.0.3 r8 (g51db56d)


> Posted by CurseForge user mOOwalker | Imported from CurseForge issue #973 | Raw

comments.body:
Thanks. Fixed in ga9e6ff3


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
